Anđušić ostaje u Buržu
Srpski košarkaš ostaje u Fracuskoj do kraja sezone

05 Nov 2019

Odlične partije na početku sezone, kao i treće mesto na tabeli francuskog košarkaškog šampionata učinile su da Burž ozbiljno porazmisli o očuvanja tima za ostatak takmičarske godine. I prvi korak ka tome su napravili kasno sinoć. Ugovor sa ovim klubom produžio je Danilo Anđušić, koji će sa starim timom nastaviti da igra sve do kraja tekuće godine.
Srpski košarkaš je u Burž stigao nakon povrede Gareta Sima, a nakon toga se fantastično uklopio u burški kolektiv. U dosadašnjem delu sezone u proseku je postizao 16,7 poena po utakmici uz 3,8 skokova i 3,5 asistencija što je bilo dovoljno za indeks 17,3. Nema sumnje da je Anđušić jedan od najboljih košarkaša francuskog prvoligaša u ovom trenutku, pošto je trenutno peti najefikasniji igrač u Francuskoj, a istovremeno i 11. na listi „najkorisnijih“.
Pre Burža, Danilo Anđušič je u karijeri nastupao i za ekipe Igokee, Partizana, Uniksa, Anvila, Virtusa iz Bolonje i Mege. Sa mladom reprezentacijom Srbije do 18 godina starosti osvojio je zlatnu medalju na šampionatu u Francuskoj, dok je dve godine ranije u Grčkoj sa svojom generacijom došao do još jednog zlatnog odličja.
Zanimljivo je da Burž sa klupe predvodio crnogorski stručnjak Savo Vučević, koji se već tri godine nalazi na čelu stručnog štaba ove ekipe. Prethodno je dve godine sa uspehom bio član stručnog štaba Monaka, koji je trenutno u rukama Saše Obradovića.

Andjusic stays in the Bourgeois
The Serbian basketball player remains in Fracuska until the end of the season

05 Nov 2019

Great games at the start of the season, as well as a third place in the French Basketball Championship standings, made Burge think seriously about maintaining the team for the rest of the competitive year. And they made the first step late last night. The contract with this club was extended by Danilo Andjusic, who will continue to play with the old team until the end of the current year.
The Serbian basketball player arrived in Bourgeois after Gareth Sim's injury, and after that he fit in with the Bourgeois team. So far, he has averaged 16.7 points per game with 3.8 rebounds and 3.5 assists, which was enough for the index of 17.3. There is no doubt that Anjusic is one of the best basketball players in the French first-team at the moment, as he is currently the fifth most efficient player in France and at the same time the 11th on the "most useful" list.
Prior to the Bourgeois, Danilo Anđusic played for Igokea, Partizan, Unix, Anvil, Virtus from Bologna and Mega in his career. With the young Serbian national team under 18, he won a gold medal at the championship in France, while two years earlier in Greece he and his generation came to another gold medal.
It is interesting that Bourgeois from the bench was led by Montenegrin expert Savo Vucevic, who has been at the helm of this team's headquarters for three years. For the past two years he has been a successful member of the Monaco Expert Staff, currently in the hands of Sasa Obradovic.
